lines.text: Panties, white girl... I want your sweet, white panties.
You promised me all the ass I wanted - WHITE ass!
Generally only guys look at me like that, but it's a free country.
This country may be free, but this town belongs to Rex, and Rex belongs to me, and Rodney belongs to Liz, and that's the way it is.
That's very good... free, me, Liz, is. Say, which one does the jungle bunny belong to?
You like white ass, don't you Jimmy?
That bitch, that goddamn bitch! I warned Rodney. Look, when do they think he'll be out?
Rex, what the hell difference does that make? She cut his balls off, he's better off dead!
She's one of us, Liz; just a bored little child of the jet-set.
This afternoon she looked about like the jet-set as some scrawny alley cat would next to one of my pure-bred Siamese kittens.
